response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk\_factors": [
    ("Age", "medium", "Young age (19 years old) can be associated with higher recidivism rates."),
    ("Race", "low", "Being White might indicate a lower risk, although this factor may not be applicable in all jurisdictions."),
    ("Arrests", "medium", "Two prior arrests suggest a history of criminal behavior."),
    ("Convictions", "medium", "One or more convictions indicate a higher likelihood of reoffending."),
    ("Height", "low", "Height may not be a significant factor, but it could influence perception of threat by others."),
    ("Weight", "low", "Similar to height, weight may not be a significant factor, but it could influence perception of threat by others."),
    ("Marital Status", "medium", "Living alone might indicate a lack of social support, which can increase the likelihood of reoffending."),
    ("Education", "high", "Lack of high school diploma or GED certificate and no current enrollment in college can be associated with higher recidivism rates."),
    ("Employment", "medium", "Having only one job during the year might indicate instability and could contribute to recidivism."),
    ("Drug Use", "high", "History of drug use, particularly recent heavy usage, can be a strong predictor of reoffending."),
    ("Mental Health", "medium", "Feeling 'so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up' might indicate mental health issues, which can increase the likelihood of reoffending."),
    ("Family Structure", "low", "Growing up with both biological parents in a household of size 4 may not be a significant factor, but it could influence individual behavior and support networks."),
    ("Religiosity", "medium", "Lack of belief in the role of God can indicate a lack of spiritual guidance, which might contribute to recidivism.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 85
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 19-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 2 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 230 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and all of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 4. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
